quote.quote: I have witnessed the softening of the hardest of hearts by a simple smile.
quote.author: Goldie Hawn

quote.quote: When you judge another, you do not define them, you define yourself.
quote.author: Wayne Dyer

quote.quote: The only way to live is to accept each minute as an unrepeatable miracle, which is exactly what it is: a miracle and unrepeatable.
quote.author: Storm Jameson

quote.quote: We are all here for some special reason. Stop being a prisoner of your past. Become the architect of your future.
quote.author: Robin Sharma

quote.quote: When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion.
quote.author: Abraham Lincoln

quote.quote: The best way out is always through.
quote.author: Robert Frost

quote.quote: I don't know what the future may hold, but I know who holds the future.
quote.author: Ralph Abernathy

quote.quote: People become really quite remarkable when they start thinking that they can do things. When they believe in themselves they have the first secret of success.
quote.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote.quote: The elevator to success is out of order. You'll have to use the stairs... one step at a time.
quote.author: Joe Girard

quote.quote: Always walk through life as if you have something new to learn, and you will.
quote.author: Vernon Howard

quote.quote: He who is not everyday conquering some fear has not learned the secret of life.
quote.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote.quote: True terror is to wake up one morning and discover that your high school class is running the country.
quote.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote.quote: Every time you don't follow your inner guidance, you feel a loss of energy, loss of power, a sense of spiritual deadness.
quote.author: Shakti Gawain

quote.quote: Believe in love. Believe in magic. Hell, believe in Santa Clause. Believe in others. Believe in yourself. Believe in your dreams. If you don't, who will?
quote.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quote.quote: Never mistake motion for action.
quote.author: Ernest Hemingway

quote.quote: Silence is the sleep that nourishes wisdom.
quote.author: Francis Bacon

quote.quote: Maxim for life: You get treated in life the way you teach people to treat you.
quote.author: Wayne Dyer

quote.quote: Stay committed to your decisions, but stay flexible in your approach.
quote.author: Tony Robbins

quote.quote: You can tell whether a man is clever by his answers. You can tell whether a man is wise by his questions.
quote.author: Naguib Mahfouz

quote.quote: Develop success from failures. Discouragement and failure are two of the surest stepping stones to success.
quote.author: Dale Carnegie

quote.quote: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
quote.author: Henry David Thoreau

quote.quote: The very purpose of Christ's coming into the world was that He might offer up His life as a sacrifice for the sins of men.  He came to die.  This is the heart of Christmas.
quote.author: Billy Graham

quote.quote: You have to grow from the inside out. None can teach you, none can make you spiritual. There is no other teacher but your own soul.
quote.author: Swami Vivekananda

quote.quote: God has given us two hands, one to receive with and the other to give with.
quote.author: Billy Graham

quote.quote: You can close your eyes to the things you don't want to see, but you can't close your heart to the things you don't want to feel.
quote.author: Johnny Depp

quote.quote: The most common way people give up their power is by thinking they don't have any.
quote.author: Alice Walker

quote.quote: If you can believe it, the mind can achieve it.
quote.author: Ronnie Lott

quote.quote: If Tyranny and Oppression come to this land, it will be in the guise of fighting a foreign enemy.
quote.author: James Madison

quote.quote: I do believe we're all connected. I do believe in positive energy. I do believe in the power of prayer. I do believe in putting good out into the world. And I believe in taking care of each other.
quote.author: Harvey Fierstein

quote.quote: What we think or what we know or what we believe is in the end of little consequence. The only thing of consequence is what we do
quote.author: John Ruskin

quote.quote: Never dull your shine for somebody else.
quote.author: Tyra Banks

quote.quote: It can not be emphasized too strongly or too often that this great nation was founded, not by religionists, but by Christians, not on religions, but on the gospel of Jesus Christ!
quote.author: Unknown

quote.quote: To give thanks in solitude is enough. Thanksgiving has wings and goes where it must go. Your prayer knows much more about it than you do.
quote.author: Victor Hugo

quote.quote: Don't compare your life to others. You have no idea what they have been through.
quote.author: Sam Cawthorn

quote.quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you.
quote.author: Rumi

quote.quote: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
quote.author: Anton Chekhov

quote.quote: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.
quote.author: Helen Keller

quote.quote: If you are losing faith in human nature, go out and watch a marathon.
quote.author: Kathrine Switzer

quote.quote: The tree of liberty must be refreshed from time to time with the blood of patriots and tyrants.
quote.author: Thomas Jefferson

quote.quote: I've read the last page of the Bible. It's all going to turn out all right.
quote.author: Billy Graham

quote.quote: From what we get, we can make a living; what we give, however, makes a life.
quote.author: Arthur Ashe

quote.quote: Just because Fate doesn't deal you the right cards, it doesn't mean you should give up. It just means you have to play the cards you get to their maximum potential.
quote.author: Les Brown

quote.quote: Don't you ever let a soul in the world tell you that you can't be exactly who you are.
quote.author: Lady Gaga

quote.quote: We must overcome the notion that we must be regular... it robs you of the chance to be extraordinary and leads you to the mediocre.
quote.author: Uta Hagen

quote.quote: Exercise is king. Nutrition is queen. Put them together and you've got a kingdom.
quote.author: Jack LaLanne

quote.quote: You have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.
quote.author: John Bunyan

quote.quote: All the great things are simple, and many can be expressed in a single word: freedom, justice, honor, duty, mercy, hope.
quote.author: Winston Churchill

quote.quote: Talent is cheaper than table salt. What separates the talented individual from the successful one is a lot of hard work.
quote.author: Stephen King

quote.quote: Watch your manner of speech if you wish to develop a peaceful state of mind. Start each day by affirming peaceful, contented and happy attitudes and your days will tend to be pleasant and successful.
quote.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote.quote: When a person really desires something, all the universe conspires to help that person to realize his dream.
quote.author: Paulo Coelho

quote.quote: The brighter you are, the more you have to learn.
quote.author: Don Herold

quote.quote: When you dance, your purpose is not to get to a certain place on the floor. It's to enjoy each step along the way.
quote.author: Wayne Dyer

quote.quote: Most people ask for happiness on condition. Happiness can only be felt if you don't set any condition.
quote.author: Arthur Rubinstein

quote.quote: The person born with a talent they are meant to use will find their greatest happiness in using it.
quote.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote.quote: Nothing is so permanent as a temporary government program.
quote.author: Milton Friedman

quote.quote: Today, more than ever before, life must be characterized by a sense of Universal responsibility, not only nation to nation and human to human, but also human to other forms of life.
quote.author: Dalai Lama

quote.quote: Effort only fully releases its reward after a person refuses to quit.
quote.author: Napoleon Hill

quote.quote: You're never as good as everyone tells you when you win, and you're never as bad as they say when you lose.
quote.author: Lou Holtz

quote.quote: I do not think much of a man who is not wiser today than he was yesterday.
quote.author: Abraham Lincoln

quote.quote: Humor is by far the most significant activity of the human brain.
quote.author: Edward de Bono

quote.quote: We should certainly count our blessings, but we should also make our blessings count.
quote.author: Neal A. Maxwell

quote.quote: As the family goes, so goes the nation and so goes the whole world in which we live.
quote.author: Pope John Paul II

quote.quote: Everyone has inside of him a piece of good news. The good news is that you don't know how great you can be! How much you can love! What you can accomplish! And what your potential is!
quote.author: Anne Frank

quote.quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
quote.author: Marcus Aurelius

quote.quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
quote.author: William James

quote.quote: When you are offended at any man's fault, turn to yourself and study your own failings. Then you will forget your anger.
quote.author: Epictetus

quote.quote: I have never met a man so ignorant that I couldn't learn something from him.
quote.author: Galileo Galilei

quote.quote: The supreme art of war is to subdue the enemy without fighting.
quote.author: Sun Tzu

quote.quote: If everyone is thinking alike, then somebody isn't thinking.
quote.author: George S. Patton

quote.quote: A nation can survive its fools, and even the ambitious. But it cannot survive treason from within. An enemy at the gates is less formidable, for he is known and carries his banner openly. But the traitor moves amongst those within the gate freely, his sly whispers rustling through all the alleys, heard in the very halls of government itself.
quote.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote.quote: It is foolish and wrong to mourn the men who died. Rather we should thank God that such men lived.
quote.author: George S. Patton

quote.quote: An invincible determination can accomplish almost anything and in this lies the great distinction between great men and little men.
quote.author: Thomas Fuller

quote.quote: The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves.
quote.author: Ray Kroc

quote.quote: Can anything be sadder than work left unfinished? Yes, work never begun.
quote.author: Christina Rossetti

quote.quote: Don't just read the easy stuff. You may be entertained by it, but you will never grow from it.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: And by the way, everything in life is writable about if you have the outgoing guts to do it, and the imagination to improvise. The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
quote.author: Sylvia Plath

quote.quote: You've got to get to the stage in life where going for it is more important than winning or losing.
quote.author: Arthur Ashe

quote.quote: One of the hardest things in life is having words in your heart that you can't utter.
quote.author: James Earl Jones

quote.quote: Success is not to be pursued; it is to be attracted by the person you become.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: You can't separate peace from freedom because no one can be at peace unless he has his freedom.
quote.author: Malcolm X

quote.quote: Never allow someone to be your priority while allowing yourself to be their option.
quote.author: Mark Twain

quote.quote: Realize that true happiness lies within you. Waste no time and effort searching for peace and contentment and joy in the world outside. Remember that there is no happiness in having or in getting, but only in giving. Reach out. Share. Smile. Hug. Happiness is a perfume you cannot pour on others without getting a few drops on yourself.
quote.author: Og Mandino

quote.quote: There is little difference in people, but that little difference makes a big difference. The little difference is attitude. The big difference is whether it is positive or negative.
quote.author: W. Clement Stone

quote.quote: Faithful servants never retire. You can retire from your career, but you will never retire from serving God.
quote.author: Rick Warren

quote.quote: The average dog is a nicer person than the average person.
quote.author: Andy Rooney

quote.quote: Dad needs to show an incredible amount of respect and humor and friendship toward his mate so the kids understand their parents are sexy, they're fun, they do things together, they're best friends. Kids learn by example. If I respect Mom, they're going to respect Mom.
quote.author: Tim Allen

quote.quote: We are United States Marines, and for two and a quarter centuries we have defined the standards of courage, esprit, and military prowess.
quote.author: James L. Jones

quote.quote: In matters of style, swim with the current; in matters of principle, stand like a rock.
quote.author: Thomas Jefferson

quote.quote: Patience is the companion of wisdom.
quote.author: Saint Augustine

quote.quote: The two hardest tests on the spiritual road are the patience to wait for the right moment and the courage not to be disappointed with what we encounter.
quote.author: Paulo Coelho

quote.quote: We can always choose to perceive things differently. You can focus on what's wrong in your life, or you can focus on what's right.
quote.author: Marianne Williamson

quote.quote: Self-worth comes from one thing - thinking that you are worthy.
quote.author: Wayne Dyer

quote.quote: Always seek out the seed of triumph in every adversity.
quote.author: Og Mandino

quote.quote: The best vision is insight.
quote.author: Malcolm Forbes

quote.quote: Learning is the beginning of wealth. Learning is the beginning of health. Learning is the beginning of spirituality. Searching and learning is where the miracle process all begins.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: You may have a fresh start any moment you choose, for this thing that we call 'failure' is not the falling down, but the staying down.
quote.author: Mary Pickford

quote.quote: Take it from a guy: If you're in love with somebody, you will swim the stream, you will climb the mountain, you will slay the dragon. You're going to get to her somehow, some way.
quote.author: Phil McGraw

quote.quote: Being entirely honest with oneself is a good exercise.
quote.author: Sigmund Freud

quote.quote: If you break your neck, if you have nothing to eat, if your house is on fire, then you got a problem. Everything else is inconvenience.
quote.author: Robert Fulghum

quote.quote: You can love someone so much...But you can never love people as much as you can miss them.
quote.author: John Green

quote.quote: Gratitude is riches. Complaint is poverty.
quote.author: Doris Day

quote.quote: Your attitude is like a box of crayons that color your world. Constantly color your picture gray, and your picture will always be bleak. Try adding some bright colors to the picture by including humor, and your picture begins to lighten up.
quote.author: Allen Klein

quote.quote: The revolution is not an apple that falls when it is ripe. You have to make it fall.
quote.author: Che Guevara

quote.quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
quote.author: Helen Keller

quote.quote: Miracles come in moments. Be ready and willing.
quote.author: Wayne Dyer

quote.quote: Stop acting as if life is a rehearsal. Live this day as if it were your last. The past is over and gone. The future is not guaranteed.
quote.author: Wayne Dyer

quote.quote: It's amazing what ordinary people can do if they set out without preconceived notions.
quote.author: Ben Stein

quote.quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
quote.author: Thomas Paine

quote.quote: You teach best what you most need to learn.
quote.author: Richard Bach

quote.quote: All I have seen teaches me to trust the creator for all I have not seen.
quote.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote.quote: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
quote.author: Albert Einstein

quote.quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: Never forget the three powerful resources you always have available to you: love, prayer, and forgiveness.
quote.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote.quote: I prefer to be true to myself, even at the hazard of incurring the ridicule of others, rather than to be false, and to incur my own abhorrence.
quote.author: Frederick Douglass

quote.quote: It is impossible for a man to learn what he thinks he already knows.
quote.author: Epictetus

quote.quote: My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength.
quote.author: Michael Jordan

quote.quote: Without leaps of imagination, or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
quote.author: Gloria Steinem

quote.quote: I have just returned from visiting the Marines at the front, and there is not a finer fighting organization in the world!
quote.author: Douglas MacArthur

quote.quote: The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way.
quote.author: Dale Carnegie

quote.quote: Your family and your love must be cultivated like a garden. Time, effort, and imagination must be summoned constantly to keep any relationship flourishing and growing.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: Being ready is not what matters. What matters is winning after you get there.
quote.author: Victor H. Krulak

quote.quote: We should not judge people by their peak of excellence; but by the distance they have traveled from the point where they started.
quote.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote.quote: One reason so few of us achieve what we truly want is that we never direct our focus; we never concentrate our power. Most people dabble their way through life, never deciding to master anything in particular.
quote.author: Tony Robbins

quote.quote: Our freedom can be measured by the number of things we can walk away from.
quote.author: Vernon Howard

quote.quote: We've all got both light and dark inside us. What matters is the part we choose to act on. That's who we really are.
quote.author: J. K. Rowling

quote.quote: Let my soul smile through my heart and my heart smile through my eyes, that I may scatter rich smiles in sad hearts.
quote.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote.quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.
quote.author: Abigail Adams

quote.quote: America will never be destroyed from the outside. If we falter and lose our freedoms, it will be because we destroyed ourselves.
quote.author: Abraham Lincoln

quote.quote: The highest form of worship is the worship of unselfish Christian service. The greatest form of praise is the sound of consecrated feet seeking out the lost and helpless.
quote.author: Billy Graham

quote.quote: Nothing I've ever done has given me more joys and rewards than being a father to my children.
quote.author: Bill Cosby

quote.quote: If you can learn to love yourself and all the flaws, you can love other people so much better. And that makes you so happy.
quote.author: Kristin Chenoweth

quote.quote: What is hell? I maintain that it is the suffering of being unable to love.
quote.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote.quote: There is not one blade of grass, there is no color in this world that is not intended to make men rejoice.
quote.author: John Calvin

quote.quote: In the beginning of a change the patriot is a scarce man, and brave, and hated and scorned. When his cause succeeds, the timid join him, for then it costs nothing to be a patriot.
quote.author: Mark Twain

quote.quote: Stay away from what might have been, and look at what can be.
quote.author: Marsha Petrie Sue

quote.quote: One isn't necessarily born with courage, but one is born with potential. Without courage, we cannot practice any other virtue with consistency. We can't be kind, true, merciful, generous, or honest.
quote.author: Maya Angelou

quote.quote: Do not seek to follow in the footsteps of the wise. Seek what they sought.
quote.author: Matsuo Basho

quote.quote: Success is achieved by developing our strengths, not by eliminating our weaknesses.
quote.author: Marilyn vos Savant

quote.quote: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
quote.author: Aldous Huxley

quote.quote: Failure is simply a few errors in judgment, repeated every day.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: We think too much and feel too little.
quote.author: Charlie Chaplin

quote.quote: Missions is not the ultimate goal of the church. Worship is. Missions exists because worship doesn't.
quote.author: John Piper

quote.quote: It's what you learn after you know it all that counts.
quote.author: John Wooden

quote.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quote.author: Robert Frost

quote.quote: Maturity is the ability to think, speak and act your feelings within the bounds of dignity. The measure of your maturity is how spiritual you become during the midst of your frustrations.
quote.author: Samuel Ullman

quote.quote: Human beings can alter their lives by altering their attitudes of mind.
quote.author: William James

quote.quote: I pretended to be somebody I wanted to be until finally I became that person. Or he became me.
quote.author: Cary Grant

quote.quote: As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
quote.author: John F. Kennedy

quote.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right - for you'll be criticized anyway. You'll be damned if you do, and damned if you don't.
quote.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote.quote: Great spirits have always encountered opposition from mediocre minds. The mediocre mind is incapable of understanding the man who refuses to bow blindly to conventional prejudices and chooses instead to express his opinions courageously and honestly.
quote.author: Albert Einstein

quote.quote: It is not until you become a mother that your judgment slowly turns to compassion and understanding.
quote.author: Erma Bombeck

quote.quote: The only way that I could figure they could improve upon Coca-Cola, one of life's most delightful elixirs, which studies prove will heal the sick and occasionally raise the dead, is to put bourbon in it.
quote.author: Lewis Grizzard

quote.quote: Searching and learning is where the miracle process all begins.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: You must make a decision that you are going to move on. It wont happen automatically. You will have to rise up and say, ‘I don’t care how hard this is, I don’t care how disappointed I am, I’m not going to let this get the best of me. I’m moving on with my life.
quote.author: Joel Osteen

quote.quote: These young guys are playing checkers. I'm out there playing chess.
quote.author: Kobe Bryant

quote.quote: If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything.
quote.author: Malcolm X

quote.quote: I firmly believe that any man's finest hour, the greatest fulfillment of all that he holds dear, is that moment when he has worked his heart out in a good cause and lies exhausted on the field of battle - victorious.
quote.author: Vince Lombardi

quote.quote: If we're growing, we're always going to be out of our comfort zone.
quote.author: John C. Maxwell

quote.quote: It doesn't matter which side of the fence you get off on sometimes. What matters most is getting off. You cannot make progress without making decisions.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: You just can't beat the person who never gives up.
quote.author: Babe Ruth

quote.quote: Common sense is the collection of prejudices acquired by age eighteen.
quote.author: Albert Einstein

quote.quote: Our attitude towards others determines their attitude towards us.
quote.author: Earl Nightingale

quote.quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
quote.author: Khalil Gibran

quote.quote: Be nice to people on your way up because you'll meet them on your way down.
quote.author: Wilson Mizner

quote.quote: When I was 5 years old, my mother always told me that happiness was the key to life. When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote down ‘happy’. They told me I didn’t understand the assignment, and I told them they didn’t understand life.
quote.author: John Lennon

quote.quote: If we learn to open our hearts, anyone, including the people who drive us crazy, can be our teacher.
quote.author: Pema Chodron

quote.quote: There is some good in this world, and it's worth fighting for.
quote.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote.quote: Greed is a bottomless pit which exhausts the person in an endless effort to satisfy the need without ever reaching satisfaction.
quote.author: Erich Fromm

quote.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quote.author: Marcus Aurelius

quote.quote: Carpe diem! Rejoice while you are alive; enjoy the day; live life to the fullest; make the most of what you have. It is later than you think.
quote.author: Horace

quote.quote: Without a sense of urgency, desire loses its value.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: Whatever good things we build end up building us.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: You're mind is working at its best when you're being paranoid. You explore every avenue and possibility of your situation at high speed with total clarity.
quote.author: Banksy

quote.quote: The purpose of life is to live it, to taste experience to the utmost, to reach out eagerly and without fear for newer and richer experience.
quote.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote.quote: They're on our right, they're on our left, they're in front of us, they're behind us; they can't get away from us this time.
quote.author: Chesty Puller

quote.quote: I'm not in this world to live up to your expectations and you're not in this world to live up to mine.
quote.author: Bruce Lee

quote.quote: The major value in life is not what you get. The major value in life is what you become.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: The cost of freedom is always high, but Americans have always paid it. And one path we shall never choose, and that is the path of surrender, or submission.
quote.author: John F. Kennedy

quote.quote: We have to be careful in how we use this light shined on us.
quote.author: Melinda Gates

quote.quote: To solve any problem, here are three questions to ask yourself: First, what could I do? Second, what could I read? And third, who could I ask?
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: I always wonder why birds choose to stay in the same place when they can fly anywhere on the earth, then I ask myself the same question.
quote.author: Harun Yahya

quote.quote: You've got to know your limitations. I don't know what your limitations are. I found out what mine were when I was twelve. I found out that there weren't too many limitations, if I did it my way.
quote.author: Johnny Cash

quote.quote: Give me six hours to chop down a tree and I will spend the first four sharpening the axe.
quote.author: Abraham Lincoln

quote.quote: If you really want to do something, you'll find a way. If you don't, you'll find an excuse.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: Be brave. Take risks. Nothing can substitute experience.
quote.author: Paulo Coelho

quote.quote: It is neither wealth nor splendor; but tranquility and occupation which give you happiness.
quote.author: Thomas Jefferson

quote.quote: A thousand words will not leave so deep an impression as one deed.
quote.author: Henrik Ibsen

quote.quote: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.
quote.author: Amelia Earhart

quote.quote: The moment we begin to fear the opinions of others and hesitate to tell the truth that is in us, and from motives of policy are silent when we should speak, the divine floods of light and life no longer flow into our souls.
quote.author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote.quote: To love means loving the unlovable. To forgive means pardoning the unpardonable. Faith means believing the unbelievable. Hope means hoping when everything seems hopeless.
quote.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote.quote: Trust yourself, you know more than you think you do.
quote.author: Benjamin Spock

quote.quote: The worst evils which mankind has ever had to endure were inflicted by bad governments.
quote.author: Ludwig von Mises

quote.quote: Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, others make it happen.
quote.author: Michael Jordan

quote.quote: High achievement always takes place in the framework of high expectation.
quote.author: Charles Kettering

quote.quote: The body is your temple. Keep it pure and clean for the soul to reside in.
quote.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quote.quote: Be like a duck. Calm on the surface, but always paddling like the dickens underneath.
quote.author: Michael Caine

quote.quote: Tears shed for self are tears of weakness, but tears shed for others are a sign of strength.
quote.author: Billy Graham

quote.quote: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems - not people; to focus your energies on answers - not excuses.
quote.author: William Arthur Ward

quote.quote: Success is neither magical nor mysterious. Success is the natural consequence of consistently applying the basic fundamentals.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: If we did all the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves.
quote.author: Thomas A. Edison

quote.quote: As long as there's pasta and Chinese food in the world, I'm okay.
quote.author: Michael Chang

quote.quote: Love is our true destiny. We do not find the meaning of life by ourselves alone - we find it with another.
quote.author: Thomas Merton

quote.quote: The few who do are the envy of the many who only watch.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: I ask, sir, what is the militia? It is the whole people except for a few public officials.
quote.author: George Mason

quote.quote: Don't brood. Get on with living and loving. You don't have forever.
quote.author: Leo Buscaglia

quote.quote: The Marines have landed and the situation is well in hand.
quote.author: Richard Harding Davis

quote.quote: Life is one big road with lots of signs,
quote.author: Bob Marley

quote.quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
quote.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote.quote: For peace of mind, we need to resign as general manager of the universe.
quote.author: Larry Eisenberg

quote.quote: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.
quote.author: Pablo Picasso

quote.quote: I am free, no matter what rules surround me. If I find them tolerable, I tolerate them; if I find them too obnoxious, I break them. I am free because I know that I alone am morally responsible for everything I do.
quote.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote.quote: Tricks and treachery are the practice of fools, that don't have brains enough to be honest.
quote.author: Benjamin Franklin

quote.quote: It's very hard in the beginning to understand that the whole idea is not to beat the other runners. Eventually you learn that the competition is against the little voice inside you that wants you to quit.
quote.author: George A. Sheehan

quote.quote: A well-developed sense of humor is the pole that adds balance to your steps as you walk the tightrope of life.
quote.author: William Arthur Ward

quote.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
quote.author: Confucius

quote.quote: We relish news of our heroes, forgetting that we are extraordinary to somebody too.
quote.author: Helen Hayes

quote.quote: It isn't the mountain ahead that wears you out; it's the grain of sand in your shoe.
quote.author: Robert W. Service

quote.quote: Difficulties are meant to rouse, not discourage. The human spirit is to grow strong by conflict.
quote.author: William Ellery Channing

quote.quote: It takes less time to do a thing right, than it does to explain why you did it wrong.
quote.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote.quote: The longer we dwell on our misfortunes, the greater is their power to harm us
quote.author: Voltaire

quote.quote: Sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast.
quote.author: Lewis Carroll

quote.quote: Do not fear mistakes. There are none.
quote.author: Miles Davis

quote.quote: Empty your mind, be formless. Shapeless, like water. If you put water into a cup, it becomes the cup. You put water into a bottle and it becomes the bottle. You put it in a teapot it becomes the teapot. Now, water can flow or it can crash. Be water, my friend.
quote.author: Bruce Lee

quote.quote: Expose yourself to your deepest fear; after that, fear has no power, and the fear of freedom shrinks and vanishes. You are free.
quote.author: Jim Morrison

quote.quote: Anger is an acid that can do more harm to the vessel in which it is stored than to anything on which it is poured.
quote.author: Mark Twain

quote.quote: Failure is success if we learn from it.
quote.author: Malcolm Forbes

quote.quote: You are here to enable the divine purpose of the Universe to unfold. That is how important you are!
quote.author: Eckhart Tolle

quote.quote: I still need Marines who can shoot and salute. But I need Marines who can fix jet engines and man sophisticated radar sets, as well.
quote.author: Robert E. Cushman, Jr.

quote.quote: People like us, who believe in physics, know that the distinction between past, present, and future is only a stubbornly persistent illusion.
quote.author: Albert Einstein

quote.quote: You can't expect to hit the jackpot if you don't put a few nickels in the machine.
quote.author: Flip Wilson

quote.quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quote.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote.quote: It is what we know already that often prevents us from learning.
quote.author: Claude Bernard

quote.quote: I've learned that making a 'living' is not the same thing as 'making a life'.
quote.author: Maya Angelou

quote.quote: The spirit, the will to win, and the will to excel are the things that endure. These qualities are so much more important than the events that occur.
quote.author: Vince Lombardi

quote.quote: What doesn't kill you makes you smaller
quote.author: Mario

quote.quote: When I started counting my blessings, my whole life turned around.
quote.author: Willie Nelson

quote.quote: The difficulties you meet will resolve themselves as you advance. Proceed, and light will dawn, and shine with increasing clearness on your path.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: Ninety-nine percent of the failures come from people who have the habit of making excuses.
quote.author: George Washington Carver

quote.quote: It's not what's happening to you now or what has happened in your past that determines who you become. Rather, it's your decisions about what to focus on, what things mean to you, and what you're going to do about them that will determine your ultimate destiny.
quote.author: Tony Robbins

quote.quote: Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing.
quote.author: Mother Teresa

quote.quote: Everything comes to us that belongs to us if we create the capacity to receive it.
quote.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote.quote: Live your life and forget your age.
quote.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote.quote: One of the penalties for refusing to participate in politics is that you end up being governed by your inferiors.
quote.author: Plato

quote.quote: We may not be able to prepare the future for our children, but we can at least prepare our children for the future.
quote.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote.quote: That's been one of my mantras - focus and simplicity. Simple can be harder than complex: You have to work hard to get your thinking clean to make it simple. But it's worth it in the end because once you get there, you can move mountains.
quote.author: Steve Jobs

quote.quote: The trouble with most of us is that we would rather be ruined by praise than saved by criticism.
quote.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote.quote: The smallest deed is better than the greatest intention.
quote.author: John Burroughs

quote.quote: Nothing else can quite substitute for a few well-chosen,
quote.author: Sam Walton

quote.quote: There is nothing in a caterpillar that tells you it's going to be a butterfly.
quote.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote.quote: A nation of sheep will beget a government of wolves.
quote.author: Edward R. Murrow

quote.quote: Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the former.
quote.author: Albert Einstein

quote.quote: A charming woman... doesn't follow the crowd. She is herself.
quote.author: Loretta Young

quote.quote: You don't understand anything until you learn it more than one way.
quote.author: Marvin Minsky

quote.quote: Doubt yourself and you doubt everything you see. Judge yourself and you see judges everywhere. But if you listen to the sound of your own voice, you can rise above doubt and judgment. And you can see forever.
quote.author: Nancy Lopez

quote.quote: Find the good. It's all around you. Find it, showcase it and you'll start believing in it.
quote.author: Jesse Owens

quote.quote: Happiness in marriage is entirely a matter of chance.
quote.author: Jane Austen

quote.quote: The difference between a mountain and a molehill is your perspective.
quote.author: Al Neuharth

quote.quote: It is best to act with confidence, no matter how little right you have to it.
quote.author: Lillian Hellman

quote.quote: Men occasionally stumble over the truth, but most of them pick themselves up and hurry off as if nothing had happened.
quote.author: Winston Churchill

quote.quote: People usually consider walking on water or in thin air a miracle. But I think the real miracle is not to walk either on water or in thin air, but to walk on earth. Every day we are engaged in a miracle which we don't even recognize: a blue sky, white clouds, green leaves, the black, curious eyes of a child -- our own two eyes. All is a miracle.
quote.author: Nhat Hanh

quote.quote: Freedom means the opportunity to be what we never thought we would be.
quote.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote.quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
quote.author: Judy Garland

quote.quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
quote.author: Og Mandino

quote.quote: If you run, you are a runner. It doesn't matter how fast or how far. It doesn't matter if today is your first day or if you've been running for twenty years. There is no test to pass, no license to earn, no membership card to get. You just run.
quote.author: John Bingham

quote.quote: The deepest principle in human nature is the craving to be appreciated.
quote.author: William James

quote.quote: About all you can do in life is be who you are. Some people will love you for you. Most will love you for what you can do for them, and some won't like you at all.
quote.author: Rita Mae Brown

quote.quote: To find out what one is fitted to do, and to secure an opportunity to do it, is the key to happiness.
quote.author: John Dewey

quote.quote: Forgiveness says you are given another chance to make a new beginning.
quote.author: Desmond Tutu

quote.quote: What is success? I think it is a mixture of having a flair for the thing that you are doing; knowing that it is not enough, that you have got to have hard work and a certain sense of purpose.
quote.author: Margaret Thatcher

quote.quote: The past has no power over the present moment.
quote.author: Eckhart Tolle

quote.quote: Do not let your fire go out, spark by irreplaceable spark in the hopeless swamps of the not-quite, the not-yet, and the not-at-all. Do not let the hero in your soul perish in lonely frustration for the life you deserved and have never been able to reach. The world you desire can be won. It exists.. it is real.. it is possible.. it's yours.
quote.author: Ayn Rand

quote.quote: No person was ever honored for what he received. Honor has been the reward for what he gave.
quote.author: Calvin Coolidge

quote.quote: Wherever you are, and whatever you do, be in love.
quote.author: Rumi

quote.quote: The world is a dangerous place to live; not because of the people who are evil, but because of the people who don't do anything about it.
quote.author: Albert Einstein

quote.quote: Love yourself-accept yourself-forgive yourself-and be good to yourself, because without you the rest of us are without a source of many wonderful things.
quote.author: Leo Buscaglia

quote.quote: I love things that age well - things that don't date, that stand the test of time and that become living examples of the absolute best.
quote.author: Giorgio Armani

quote.quote: The person, be it gentleman or lady, who has not pleasure in a good novel, must be intolerably stupid.
quote.author: Jane Austen

quote.quote: Better be wise by the misfortunes of others than by your own.
quote.author: Aesop

quote.quote: Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect.
quote.author: Mark Twain

quote.quote: And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music.
quote.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote.quote: Curiosity is one of the most permanent and certain characteristics of a vigorous intellect.
quote.author: Samuel Johnson

quote.quote: Leaders must be close enough to relate to others, but far enough ahead to motivate them.
quote.author: John C. Maxwell

quote.quote: Regret for the things we did can be tempered by time; it is regret for the things we did not do that is inconsolable.
quote.author: Sydney J. Harris

quote.quote: For every disciplined effort there is a multiple reward.
quote.author: Jim Rohn

quote.quote: The spiritual journey is individual, highly personal. It can't be organized or regulated. It isn't true that everyone should follow one path. Listen to your own truth.
quote.author: Ram Dass

quote.quote: No matter how plain a woman may be, if truth and honesty are written across her face, she will be beautiful.
quote.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote.quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled but a fire to be kindled.
quote.author: Plutarch

quote.quote: America... just a nation of two hundred million used car salesmen with all the money we need to buy guns and no qualms about killing anybody else in the world who tries to make us uncomfortable.
quote.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote.quote: Thousands have lived without love, not one without water.
quote.author: W. H. Auden

quote.quote: The best way to keep one's word is not to give it.
quote.author: Napoleon Bonaparte
